attributes.action: Remove 'God Save the Queen' as the national British anthem, and replace it with 'Land of Hope & Glory'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'God Save the Queen' is a boring, mundane, cliched, and uninspiring song. 'Land of Hope and Glory' is a well-written, inspiring anthem by a great British composer; it would be much more appropriate as our anthem as a result.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
